byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti and Patrick McGeehan contributed reporting.

abstract: Donald Trump lobs additional insults at Republican lawmakers who criticized his  attacks upon Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of slain Muslim soldier, exhibiting belligerence that threatens to undo his tenuous relationship to party at beginning of campaign; has been ignoring advice of campaign advisers and allies to end feud even as Republicans begin entertaining whether to withdraw their support.

headline.print_headline: Trump Swipes at Republicans After Rebukes
headline.main: Ignoring Advice, Donald Trump Presses Attack on Khan Family and G.O.P. Leaders

snippet: The continuing attacks threaten to shatter Mr. Trump’s uneasy alliance with the Republican Party at the outset of the general election...
lead_paragraph: The continuing attacks threaten to shatter Mr. Trump’s uneasy alliance with the Republican Party at the outset of the general election
